SEARCH
Package com.dua3.utility.awt

Class AwtFontUtil

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.awt.AwtFontUtil
All Implemented Interfaces:
FontUtil<Font>
public final class AwtFontUtil extends Object implements FontUtil<Font>
Utility class for getting font properties through AWT. This class should normally not be used directly by user code as the functionality should be available in the TextUtil utility class which in turn uses this class via SPI (Java ServiceProvider interface). See usage of FontUtil in TextUtil for details.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.dua3.utility.text.FontUtil
